translations.architecture-page.description: IDEM uses specialized AI agents that work together intelligently. Each agent focuses on its expertise while the orchestrator coordinates everything for optimal results.

translations.architecture-page.workflow.description: See how agents collaborate to build a complete project. From initial planning to final delivery, our multi-agent system ensures quality and efficiency at every step.
translations.architecture-page.workflow.step1.descrip: You describe your project idea and requirements
translations.architecture-page.workflow.step2.descrip: Orchestrator analyzes requirements and creates execution plan
translations.architecture-page.workflow.step3.descrip: Research, Business, Design, and Technical agents work simultaneously
translations.architecture-page.workflow.step4.title: Quality Validation
translations.architecture-page.workflow.step4.descrip: Orchestrator validates outputs and ensures consistency
translations.architecture-page.workflow.step5.descrip: Complete project delivered with all components integrated
translations.architecture-page.cta.description: See how specialized agents work together to build your project faster and better
translations.architecture-page.agents.orchestrator.de: Coordinates all agents and manages the overall project workflow
translations.architecture-page.agents.research.name: Research Agent
translations.architecture-page.agents.research.descri: Conducts market research and competitive analysis
translations.architecture-page.agents.business.name: Business Agent
translations.architecture-page.agents.business.descri: Creates business plans, financial models, and go-to-market strategies
translations.architecture-page.agents.design.name: Design Agent
translations.architecture-page.agents.design.descript: Generates logos, brand guidelines, and visual assets
translations.architecture-page.agents.technical.name: Technical Agent
translations.architecture-page.agents.technical.descr: Designs system architecture and generates technical documentation
translations.architecture-page.agents.content.name: Content Agent
translations.architecture-page.agents.content.descrip: Generates website content, copy, and marketing materials

translations.architecture-page.seo.title: Multi-Agent AI Architecture | IDEM - Intelligent Collaboration
translations.architecture-page.seo.description: IDEM uses advanced multi-agent architecture with specialized AI agents working together. Orchestrator, Research, Business, Design, Technical, and Content agents collaborate for comprehensive project delivery.
translations.architecture-page.seo.keywords: multi-agent AI, AI architecture, specialized agents, orchestrator agent, AI collaboration, parallel processing, intelligent agents, AI workflow, agent coordination, scalable AI
